CustomField.description: Unit of Measure for this price. This field in combination with the product can give UOM specific pricing. This field is optional, and allows for general pricing for a product independent of UOM.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unit of Measure for this price. This field in combination with the product can give UOM specific pricing. This field is optional, and allows for general pricing for a product independent of UOM.
CustomField.label: Unit Of Measure
